articles.description: In a brand new trailer for the project, out March 12th, Soleil explained how she documented her 'entire life' on video as a teen, but only returned to the 'Pandora's box' of footage two-decades later.
articles.content:
Soleil Moon Frye was just a kid when she rose to fame as Punky Brewster.
And now the actress/director is giving the world a fascinating look at life growing up in the limelight, curating her own hom… [+4269 chars]
